Texto: 
not available
chemotherapy
3 cm suprasellar mass with homogeneous enhancement.
abnormal appearance of white matter in pons, midbrain, basal ganglia and internal capsules.
suprasellar large cell lymphoma, of the b-cell phenotype (cd20 positive).
• metastatic disease
• meningioma
• macroadenoma of pituitary gland
• sarcoid
• lymphoma, germinoma, syphilis
60 year oldwoman with 5 year history of stage iv follicular type b cell lymphoma presents now with visual symptoms and headache.
